162460.話題『<%sM_QUESTION>』について\n<%sM_SNPC>と 話します:
Do you want to talk to <%sM_SNPC> about the
topic "<%sM_QUESTION>"?<yesno><break>

163601.<%sM_JUMP_ROOM>に 行きますか？\n<yesno><break>:
Would you like to go to
<%sM_JUMP_ROOM>?<yesno><break>

163602.まだ <%sM_JUMP_ROOM>には\n遊びに行く許可を もらっていない。:
You still don't have permission to visit
the <%sM_JUMP_ROOM>.

165021.<%sM_SNPC>と どの話題について話しますか？\n<break>:
What topics would you like to talk about with
<%sM_SNPC>?<break>

165023.祈望館から出て\n通学路に 戻りますか？\n<yesno><break>:
Leave the Place of Prayer and return to the
walkways?
<yesno><break>

165641.<%sM_SNPC>の部屋は 今は訪ねられないようだ。\nお話をもうすこし 進め:
You can't visit <%sM_SNPC>'s room right
now. Try advancing the story a bit more
first.

165645.<%sM_SNPC>と 会話を通じて\n交わしたチャクラが 光となって\n輝き始:
The chakra I'd exchanged through conversation
with <%sM_SNPC> began to glow with light!<bw_break>

165778.<%sM_SNPC>と 次に話す話題を\n思いつかない……。\n寮の前にいるマチ:
I can't think of what to say next to
<%sM_SNPC>... I talked to Machime in front of
the dorm...

175988.新たな話題を <%sM_SNPC>と\n楽しんだので <pc>の会話レベルが\n:
New topic <%sM_SNPC> and
We had fun<pc> conversation level has been raised to
<%nM_AFTER_LEVEL>!
<se_nots System 7>

178291.会話レベル <%nM_NEXT_LEVEL> をめざして\n他のフウキの仲間たち:
Try to get to conversation level <%dM_NEXT_LEVEL>
and talk to many different SCC friends about
all kinds of things!

178725.会話レベルが <%nM_AFTER_LEVEL> になったことにより\n新しい話:
Now that our conversation level is <%nM_AFTER_LEVEL>, we'll have new topics to discuss... Let's talk to Machime at the front
of the dorm!

182353.そして そのあたたかい光が集まり\n形を作っていく……。: The warm light gathers and takes shape...

182354.<color_yellow>\n<%sM_Item>は 学園の中では\n使えない:
<color_yellow><%sM_Item> was sent by mail since
it's not usable at the academy. Receive it
at a post office or mailbox!
